creator: es.xml@javanet.info
text:
Viewing an old version cause the exception (below).
The sanbox pub version present at http://cms.unizh.ch:8080/lenya/sandbox/
doesn't expose this bug though. Does this means is already solved?

Error compiling view_xsp: ERROR 1
(org/apache/cocoon/www/lenya/content/rc/view_xsp.java): ... ; String
rootDir=publication.getEnvironment().getPublicationPath(); String
servletContextPath = publication.getServletContext().getCanonicalPath(); //
start error (lines 138-138) "The static field Publication.CONTENT_PATH should be
accessed in a static way" String contextPath = publication.CONTENT_PATH; // end
error String area = (
String.valueOf(this._xsp_module_helper.getAttribute(objectModel,
"page-envelope","area","")) ... Line 138, column 0: The static field
Publication.CONTENT_PATH should be accessed in a static way

creator: egli@apache.org
text:
The fix is not to replace publication.CONTENT_PATH with "content". It really
should be replaced with Publication.CONTENT_PATH (Class name instead of instance
name)

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> The fix is not to replace publication.CONTENT_PATH with "content". It really
> should be replaced with Publication.CONTENT_PATH (Class name instead of instance
> name)

why didnt you just fix it then?
